typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		SalesId as integer,
		SalesPersonId as integer,
		CustomerId as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		Sku as string,
		Price as decimal(18,2),
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		Quantity as integer,
		DiscountPct as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: ($modifiedAfter),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'Sales.cdm.json/Sales',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Sales',
	corpusPath: 'Test_Logical/sm-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	folderPath: 'Test_Physical/sm-exported/Sales',
	fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy','yyyy/MM/dd','yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy.MM.dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy.MM.dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss','MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM.dd.yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM.dd.yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy','yyyy/MM/dd','yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy.MM.dd']) ~> SalesDeltaSource
source(output(
		ItemSku as string,
		ItemName as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(13,2),
		ItemId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: 'Item.cdm.json/Item',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Item',
	corpusPath: 'Test_Logical/stdm-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	folderPath: 'Test_Physical/stdm-exported/Item',
	fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy','yyyy/MM/dd','yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy.MM.dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy.MM.dd hh:mm:ss a','yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss','MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM.dd.yyyy hh:mm:ss a','MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM.dd.yyyy HH:mm:ss','MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy','yyyy/MM/dd','yyyy-MM-dd','yyyy.MM.dd']) ~> TargetItem
SalesDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(SalesId),
	SalesPersonId = last(SalesPersonId),
		CustomerId = last(CustomerId),
		ProductName = last(ProductName),
		Sku = last(Sku),
		Price = last(Price),
		OrderDate = last(OrderDate),
		Quantity = last(Quantity),
		DiscountPct = last(DiscountPct)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesDeltaSource
Deduplicated1SalesDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku = Sku,
		ItemName = ProductName,
		ListPrice = Price
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PreSKSelectItem
PreSKSelectItem aggregate(groupBy(ItemSku),
	ItemName = last(ItemName),
		ListPrice = last(ListPrice)) ~> Deduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
Deduplicated1PreSKSelectItem select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
TargetItem aggregate(groupBy(ItemSku),
	ItemName = last(ItemName),
		ListPrice = last(ListPrice),
		ItemId = last(ItemId)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetItem
Deduplicated1TargetItem select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku,
		ItemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1TargetItem
SelectDeduplicated1TargetItem select(mapColumn(
		TarItemSku = ItemSku,
		TarItemId = ItemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem
SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem, SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem join(ItemSku === TarItemSku,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem filter(isNull(TarItemId)) ~> FilterInsertItem
FilterInsertItem select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> InsertItem
InsertItem keyGenerate(output(Sk_ItemId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SkItem
SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem aggregate(Max_TarItemId = max(toInteger(TarItemId)) + 0) ~> AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem
AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem derive(Max_TarItemId = iif(isNull(Max_TarItemId),0,Max_TarItemId)) ~> MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem
SkItem, MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem join(true() === true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem
JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem derive(ItemId = Sk_ItemId + Max_TarItemId) ~> DerivedItem
DerivedItem select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku,
		ItemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PostSkItem
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetItem filter(!isNull(TarItemId)) ~> FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku,
		ItemId = TarItemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
PostSkItem, UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem union(byName: true)~> UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem select(mapColumn(
		TarItemSku = ItemSku,
		TarItemId = ItemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
PreSKSelectItem, SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem join(ItemSku === TarItemSku,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem
JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectItem select(mapColumn(
		ItemSku,
		ItemName,
		ListPrice,
		ItemId = TarItemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FinalItem
FinalItem aggregate(groupBy(ItemSku),
	ItemName = last(ItemName),
		ListPrice = last(ListPrice),
		ItemId = last(ItemId)) ~> Item
Item sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'Item.cdm.json/Item',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Item',
	folderPath: 'Test_Physical/stdm-exported/Item',
	fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	corpusPath: 'Test_Logical/stdm-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'idwsource',
	truncate: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ItemSink
